Past warming has an average per annum cost of AU$26.3 million for claims related to heat in Victoria
Past warming has an average per annum cost of AU$35.6 million for all workplace injuries and diseases in Victoria
For laborers and tradespersons (Construction, Manufacturing, and Agriculture, Forestry & Fishing) the annual costs are AU$15.6 million for claims
For laborers and tradespersons (Construction, Manufacturing, and Agriculture, Forestry & Fishing) the annual costs are AU$21.2 million overall.
A 1.5 ◦C increase in temperatures costing an additional AU $54.8million each year in heat-related injuries and diseases at work.
